solution_line_template: First convert {total_minutes} minutes to hours: {total_minutes} minutes / {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hours = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.
In 1 hour, I run {total_miles} miles / {total_hours} hours = <<{total_miles}/{total_hours}={average_speed_mph}>>{average_speed_mph} miles/hour.
